basics.name: Manthan N. Dhisale
basics.label: IIT Bombay ❖ EATON Corporation
basics.summary: Hi there! Greetings :). I completed my Master's from Department of Mechanical Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay. I have found that nothing satisfies me more than meeting new people, solving problems and contributing to overall technology development. Feel free to reach me out on my email or linkedin to discuss anything on Tech & Life :).

education.institution: Willingdon College of Arts and Science, Sangli
Shri A. B. P. English School, Sangli

work.summary: Part of Center for Digital Enginering team which supports on CAE, CFD and CAD aspects of product development. Contribued in designing of various EV transmissions, Clutch, Battery Disconnector Units for various customers like TESLA, Cummins, GM, HKMC and Ford Motors

work.company: National Center of Aerospace Innovation and Research, IIT Bombay
work.summary: Part of Cyber Physical Systems Group responsible for development and implementation of hybrid Mechanical-AI/ML techniques for various Industry sponsored projects.

Worked on two major projects in Supply Chain. First was ‘Designing of Warehouse Health Management Scorecard : Benchmarking of best Warehousing Practices across FMCG and across industries and creating a Scorecard' benchmarking of important scorecard templates, finding metrices to record. Second was ‘Warehouse Loading-Unloading of Fast Moving Consumer Goods (FMCGs) Productivity Tracker’ involving development of template using VBA for determining and optimizing bay productivity for loading-unloading of FMCG goods.

Development of Cost Estimation Tool for Injection Moulded Polymer Products for Lighting Division, EIIC. The project aimed to develop a technique called “Design for Economy” which will help predict the price of final polymer products (both NPD and TPD) during the Design Stage itself by controlling the design, mfg. and material configurations.
Involved “Designing of Automated Guided Vehicle Utilities like Scrubber Motor Modelling (60W) and Squeegee Design (720W)” for specified requirements.

The task “Productivity Tracking for fleet management based on Object recognition using Computer Vision Techniques over low power-edge computing devices like Raspberry Pi and Android” involved the deployment of CNN models using Tensorflow on Raspberry Pi and Tensorlite on Android.

work.company: National Institute of Fashion Technology, Mumbai
work.summary: Delivered a Bachelor’s course on “Introduction to Internet of Things” using Proteus software as a Junior Expert Lecturer in a National Institute. Consulted the students for their Internet of Things projects.

volunteer.summary: Led a team of IIT Bombay’s best techno savvies among all 23 IITs. Achieved a historic victory for IIT Bombay by securing overall First Runner Up among all 23 IITs with 13,000 participants.

volunteer.organization: Team RAKSHAK Unmanned Aerial Vehicles, IITB
volunteer.summary: Leading a team of 40+ members and contributing in the domains of Aero-structure, Controls and Software for AUVSI-SUAS International Challenge.

volunteer.organization: Deep Learning Student Reading Group, IIT Bombay
volunteer.summary: The Deep Learning-SRG comprised of Bachelors, Dual Degree, Masters and PhDs enthusiastic about Deep Learning advancement in Mechanical Department.

volunteer.organization: Department Post Graduate Council, Mechanical Department, IIT Bombay
volunteer.summary: Resolved academic issues of 150+ Masters, PhD and Post Docs in Mechanical department. Initiated the Post Graduate Minors in Design, Thermal and Manufacturing for the institute along with Department Post Graduate Council.
